column4: Inner loop New Circle Rd at Trade Center Dr
Tuesday December 4 at 7:00 p.m. in downtown Lexington.
Midland Ave scheduled to be closed between Winchester Rd and E Main St at 5 p.m.
Main St scheduled to be closed between Midland Ave and Mill St just prior to 7 p.m.
The NWS has issued a Winter Weather Advisory effective December 4 at 8 pm until December 5 at 1 pm.
Use added caution, slow down, and increase following distances.
